name: Origamoids
description:
Origamoids 

//Description\\
This is a school project made with unreal engine.

Top Down action game where you need to defend your nest as it travels through the world.

//Controls\\
*PLAYED WITH A XBOX CONTROLLER*

"Left-Thumb stick" to move
"A" To Dash
"X" to use ability

**THIS IS A NHTV IGAD PROJECT**

We are looking for feedback on the gameplay feel.

If you can complete the level send us a video of your skills!
